description:
My place is close to Theater District - Times Square, in the middle of everything - Close to major subways - few blocks from Central park and Hudson River - Walk to everywhere :) . You’ll love my place because of location, location, location - Walk to everywhere - Elevator building with washer and dryer (basement $ 2.50 per load) - Modern and stylish furniture - Feels like home and it is my home :) . My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families (with kids)

It's my home - enjoy comfortable bed, full kitchen with supplies that can be used, just please replace. 
There is a cute vintage bike that you're welcome to use, just take care as if was yours - any damage or loss a $ 500 will be charged. 
No closet space, or drawer space as they're full.

Entire apartment and laundry area in the basement

I'm available for any urgent matter and also keep in mind this is a doorman building with maintenance on site from Monday - Friday in case any adjustment is necessary.

Quintessentially NY life. Wake up in the middle of Times Square with a view to die for! 
Enjoy local restaurants and major attractions just walking.

Very convenient to major Subways A,C,E,S,N,Q,R, 1,2,3- walk everywhere from Times Square to Central Park to Hudson River

Sorry, no closet space and no pets.
name: Spacious Modern Studio with Times Square View
review: Le logement est idéalement situé à new York. Il est spacieux et bien équipé pour un séjour avec trois personnes.
